# f5distributedcloud_alert_policy (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_alert_policy` resource manages Alert Policies in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Alert Policies define notification rules for alerts and events.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_alert_policy" "example" {
  name        = "my-alert-policy"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Alert policy for critical alerts"

  receivers {
    name      = "slack-receiver"
    namespace = "shared"
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `receivers` (Block List) List of alert receivers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--receivers))
- `routes` (Block List) Alert routing rules. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--routes))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--receivers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `receivers`

Required:

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)


<a id="nestedblock--routes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `routes`

Required:

- `receiver` (String)

Optional:

- `match` (Map of String)
